metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17014 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
If an image had not loaded correctly (such as when it is not actually animage), it could be dragged and dropped cross-domain, resulting in across-origin information leak. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 71.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17014` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '71.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
